column4: hi i have a problem, on one of my laptops i instaled 10.04.3 and sound wount work. I checked faq and all that and system recognise sound card driver is instaled and all but there is still no sound
you have the speaker icon in top panel?
yes
click it and make sure sound is not muted
i checked this several times..sound is on max...output and hardware are selected
have you checked alsamixer levels?
mm not sure
run 'alsamixer' in terminal and check
if the levels are allright then make sure your user is member of audio group in System Settings -> Users and Groups
all levels are on max...but i have first hda ati hdmi and then second hda intel
order doesn't matter, are all levels at max?
yes
ok, check users as I wrote above
i went to group manager and then i selected "audio"
there was user and the box before
was not checked
i checked it and aplyed
but it still don't work
I got disconnected, can you please repeat if you answered me?
i went to group manager and then i selected "audio"
